STATUS.md.summary: Active plugin v0.2.0. Phase 1 + legacy commands working. v0.2 roadmap defined with 5 GitHub issues. Triage CI suspended.

NEXT_ACTIONS.md.summary: 5 tasks linked to GitHub issues. T-004 (refactor) and T-005 (tests) are high priority. T-006 (config), T-007 (windows fix) medium. T-003 (triage CI) low/blocked.

LOG.md.summary: Latest: v0.2 roadmap definition (5 GitHub issues). Previous: AAHP v3 migration, Phase 1 commands, staging smoke, triage CI.

DASHBOARD.md.summary: v0.2 roadmap with 5 GitHub issues. T-004 through T-007 linked to issues #1-#5.

TRUST.md.summary: Commands assumed working. No build/test verification. Triage CI untested.

CONVENTIONS.md.summary: Report-only for destructive ops, staging gate, no secrets in output.

WORKFLOW.md.summary: 2-agent pipeline. Safety rules: no secrets in output, staging gate required.

quick_context: openclaw-ops v0.2.0 active plugin. Phase 1 commands (/health, /services, /logs, /plugins) + legacy commands all working. /health now shows active model cooldowns from model-failover state. /limits refactored to use shared cooldown utility. T-002 (cooldown detection) done, T-005 (tests) ready, T-007 (win disk) ready, T-006 (config) ready, T-003 (triage) blocked.

T-001.title: Improve /limits command output
T-001.note: Reformatted to match Phase 1 style: status icons, cleaner sections, auth expiry parsing with urgency indicators

T-002.title: Add active cooldown detection from model-failover state
T-002.note: Extracted loadActiveCooldowns + formatCooldownLine into src/utils.ts, added COOLDOWNS section to /health, refactored /limits to use shared utility, 9 new tests

T-003.title: Fix and re-enable triage CI
T-003.blocked_by: 403 cross-repo permission error - needs PAT with repo scope

T-004.title: Extract shared utilities into a common module

T-005.title: Add test infrastructure and basic command tests

T-008.title: Add /skills and /shortcuts commands
T-008.note: skills-commands.ts: scans workspace for all openclaw-* plugins, extracts commands from source via regex, /skills shows per-plugin detail, /shortcuts shows flat A-Z cheat-sheet + grouped by plugin
